page.title: 13Computers and Calculators
page.content: A computer has a plastic keyboard with buttons that have letters on. You type in a word. In the end you can make a program that draws pictures and things.{There}are{12 people with {computers}and{23 people with {calculators}in our class of{26 {children (Mrs Wilson's).}You can get a tape recorder and have a taped program to put it. It loads and you can play a game with the keys or a joy stick. A calculator is a sort of mini computer except you add up and take away and multiply by and a few other things. In Mr. Walsh's class of{29 children, {14 have got computers {and 25 have got calculators. { By Sarah Hughes and Jill Tomlinson
